column3: Traffic;Kampong Chhnang:------ A pick up truck carrying fish crashed into a house
column10: the vehicle “Phnom Penh 2AL-8591” swerved to avoid a motorcycle. The truck couldn’t stop
column11: questions are raised over the condition of the breaks
column12: and it slammed into a house.------After the incident
column13: the cops measured the car to keep waiting for make a settlement with the building owner.
